title: Empire Game Sound Effects
description: Wield the ferocious power of Empire Game now featuring more than 600 mixed and mastered game ready sound effects guaranteed to have your enemies on the run & vivid fantasy worlds created.
longDescription:
Soundcloud Demo

Sound Pack - Empire Game includes a total of 618 SFX – Inspired by hit RTS & strategy computer games like Rome: Total War & Age of Empires. Empire Game is an expertly crafted and imagined war machine of designed historical turn-based game audio assets housing all the essentials needed to build immersive civilizations, settlements, towns, crafting, professions, armies, UI ranging from realistic to designed & heavily processed game audio assets that will complete almost any project where fantasy, RTS, & turn-based game assets are required. 


The library is organized into popular sound effect categories that make it easier to capture outstanding fantasy gaming experiences in the following categories: Ambience Loops, Animals, Chests & Doors, Collects, Foley, Group Footsteps, Menu UI, Professions, Settlement Alerts, Settlement Selects & Warfare.  


Empire Game includes 600+ sound fx like select watch towers, stables, barracks, religious shrines, towns, cities, castles, farms, coliseum, theater, tavern, seaport, kings palace, lumber yard, & more. Build palisades, stone walls, place construction, construct new buildings, professions like jewel crafting, blacksmithing, alchemy, enchanting, mining, production, skinning, tailoring, cooking, useful alerts & notifications like defeat, victory, death in the family, marriage, newborn, end turn, disease, war, new civilization discovered, resources, attack, military group marching footsteps, single footsteps on stone, wood, water, sand, various menu UI, animals & much more!

Note: Trailer voice and background music in audio demo not included.
technicalDetails:
Product details:

618 designed game audio assets

Includes Soundminer metadata for easy search capability. 

16 ambience loops like undead plains, desert, woodland, sea and more

7 animals & livestock sounds - pigs, horses, cows, sheep, birds

61 chests & doors - variety of designed & organic - pirate chests, lockboxes, loot crates, apothecary cabinets 

50 collects & item - crafting, upgrades, ingredients, tools, treasure, magic coins, ore, stone, & more.

92 foley sounds like wheels, hammer on wood, loot sack, loot handling, safe, silver bars, commerce, open, close, impacts, pulleys, tools,

29 army group footsteps - walking, marching - large, medium, small,

Features horse hooves, footsteps on water, stone, sand, grass, wood, plate armor, leather, cloth, chainmail

59 menu UI - build, repair, cancel, open quest, inventory placement, page turns, navigations & more

53 skill & professions - herbalism, skinning, leather-working, alchemy, blacksmithing, and much more

56 settlement alerts - marriage, death in family, disaster, victory, defeat, discovered, new law, diplomatic meeting, plaque & more

79 settlement selects - farm, lumberyard, port, tavern, arena, amphitheater, coliseum, fort, castle, capital, palace, and many more.

35 settlement UI - demolish, build, repair, drawbridge, gate, quest log, place building + more.

81 medieval warfare - arrow, bow, sword, dagger, cannon blast, blood squirt, shield bash, select cavalry, solider & much more

Number of Audio Waves: 618

Number of Audio Cues: 618

Sample rate / bit rate: 44.1k/16bit

Do Sound FX loop: Yes, some do

Minutes of audio provided: 32

Supported Development Platforms:

Windows: Yes

Mac: Yes
